task.action: Create an engaging blog post about sustainable living for a wellness website
task.objective: Inspire readers to adopt eco-friendly habits while maintaining an engaging and relatable tone

requirements.structure: hook, personal story, practical tips, environmental impact, call to action

scope.audience: Young professionals aged 25-35 interested in wellness and sustainability
scope.context: The blog will be featured on a popular wellness website with 100K+ monthly readers. The goal is to convert readers into newsletter subscribers while providing valuable content.

examples: I never thought switching to a bamboo toothbrush would make such a difference until I saw my plastic waste cut in half
Here are 5 simple swaps that took me from eco-anxious to eco-confident in just one month
The best part? These changes actually saved me money while helping the planet
